body:
Our prime minister vow's to "shirt front Mr Putin" with the justification of "Australians died in MH17 by Russian backed rebels."

Unbeknownst to Abbott is that Putin has a black belt in  tae-kwon-do and a fight between the two is most likely going to be one sided affair.

Yes I do understand MH17 was a tragedy but there is no need to act so unprofessional as Mr Abbott is the LEADER of our country. He shouldn't not be throwing out threats like a 13 year old in a school yard. Especially misguided and down-right stupid remarks such as those he stated. 

Video:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=24ruCWdyRzY  

Shirt Front:
A brutal shoulder charge in Australian rules football (AFL) where a player instead of tackling an opponent, bumps them forcefully in the chest. Often leads to heavy concussions due to incidental contact to the head.
- Urban Dictionary

replies.body:
TBH I think the Dutch should be able to act like this considering they lost 198 people. I am not being biased, but every time I see Mr. Abbot act like this it makes me wonder why he doesn't support other countries like the Netherlands were we lost 198 but only caring about Australia.
Haters gonna hate
